domain.title: Fully Qualified Domain Name
domain.description: Vaultwarden needs to know the FQDN for e.g. FIDO2 WebAuthn.

path.title: Webvault URL path
path.description: URL for webapplication, may also be '/' (but not empty).

orgname.title: E-Mail display name
orgname.description: Used for send emails - e.g. invitations to create an account.

webvault.title: Toggle webvault
webvault.description: Wheather or not the integrated webUI can be used.

websocket.title: Toggle websocket support
websocket.description: Enable to automatically inform desktop & browser clients on changes.

sends.title: Toogle sends
sends.description: Wheater or not to use Bitwarden's secure sharing system.

emergencyaccess.title: Toggle emergency access
emergencyaccess.description: Wheater or not an users may enable emergency acces functionality.

icondownload.title: Toggle icon download
icondownload.description: Wheather or not favicons for entries are fetched.

signups.title: Toggle signups
signups.description: Wheather or not new accounts can be created.

lets_encrypt.title: Let's Encrypt certificate
lets_encrypt.description: Request a TLS certificate from Let's Encrypt.

http2https.title: HTTP to HTTPS
http2https.description: Redirect plain web requests to TLS enabled port.
